actions.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments include inner city areas to rural and frontier areas among the priority populations; and provide for the creation of the Office of Special Populations.
purpose: Amendments no. 1 and no. 2 printed in the Congressional Record to establish an Office on Special Populations and include inner-city areas as a priority population.
